Career Profile

I’m a curious and focused former scientist (Ph.D.), now dedicated to helping businesses to make data-informed decisions, by exploiting big data, data visualization and data science.

My academic experience in hard sciences gave me a pragmatic approach to problem-solving and allows me to find the root cause of complex problems. I use Data Science techniques and methodology to leverage business data to inform stakeholders. No matter the seniority level, I’m able to convey technical messages to wide audiences and facilitate decision making using data-driven approaches.

I enjoy learning and I’m able to get spun up quickly on new topics. For this reason, I consider myself topic-agnostic, meaning that I’d be glad to help you in any type of data-related project, no matter your industry.

Skills & Proficiency

Project Management

Experiences

Business Analyst

2016 - 2020
Stripe Inc.

As a Business Analyst, I worked daily with a large amount of data to report on User Experience and Onboarding flows for the global Risk team at Stripe. Daily, I used SQL and Python to generate reports, create Dashboards and create ad-hoc analysis for senior management (C-level), Project managers and Analysts. Some of the projects I’m most proud of:

  • Visualize the Onboarding flow of Risk controls and interventions using a Sankey diagram
  • Evaluate potential features to improve machine learning models, by analyzing KYC/KYB data
  • Provide recommendations to identify the time window at which a customer was onboarded
  • Forecasting review volume to help headcount projections and outsourcing

Projects

These are some of my personal projects I developped using Python.

Visualizing Real Estate trends in Ireland - The use of Matplotlib, PyPlot and Bokeh to visualize Real Estate trends in Ireland.
